metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000159 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Command injection in evince via filename when printing to PDF. This affectsversions earlier than 3.25.91.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

evince - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
evince-common - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
evince-gtk - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
gir1.2-evince-3.0 - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
libevdocument3-4 - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
libevview3-3 - 3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: evince package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.10.3-0ubuntu10.4').
